comments:
I tried to compile a java source file encoded using GB18030 encoding and the J9
Vm and I got a failure.
When I tried to clear the console, I got:

I will attach the GB18030 file I am compiling.

Created an attachment (id=3367)
GB18030.java

I attach it as a binary file to prevent any conversion during the download.
Fixed. The NPE was simply a missed null check for the "line notifier".
*** Bug 31396 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
